amendment.description: To deauthorize the New Savannah Bluff Lock and Dam, Georgia and South Carolina.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5075 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5075 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 4979. (consideration: CR S5742-5743; text: CR S5742) To deauthorize the New Savannah Bluff Lock and Dam, Georgia and South Carolina.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5075 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 4979.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5075 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
